parameters:
\SE[28]So slooow!! It's not snack time anymore! \SE[55]It's the
first day, you know!? Are you even motivated...!?

\SE[9]I am very motivated, you know! Even if my best efforts
didn't lead to the desired results...! \SE[37]P-Please... give me
another chance...!

\SE[14]Sigh... I guess there's no helping it... \!\SE[1]So, what
do you want to do for our next playtime? \.You can suggest
something this time.

\SE[12]I see... \!\SE[33]When it comes to something that I can do
and would be enjoyable for the young lady...

\SE[11]How about a River Quiz!? \SE[10]You have to guess the
number of leaves flowing down the river! \SE[16]With this, I
definitely won't lose!
\SE[13]Ugh... No way... I absolutely don't want to do it...

\SE[14]Huh...!? Is that so...!? \SE[12]When I was a child, I used
to play by counting the number of leaves...

\SE[58]Eh, what's that...? Poor thing... You've been through a
lot of hardships...

\SE[59]P-Poor thing...!? \!\SE[58]Hmm, if this special move
doesn't work, \.Umm, what should we do...

\SE[1]Oh, by the way, there's a splendid piano here. \.Could it
be that you can play it?

\SE\SE[2]Well, just as a pastime I suppose. \!\SE[2]...What is
it? Do you want to hear me play?

\SE[16]I would love to hear it...! \SE[15]Although I have
absolutely no talent for playing, I really love music!

\SE[10]I believe that the ultimate form of expression is music!
\SE[11]...So, please!! \SE[10]Let me be amazed by your
performance, young lady!!

\SE[39]Why do I have to make you groan... \!\SE[48]...Well, I
guess there's no helping it.

\SE[4]Hmm... What should I play? \SE[1]For now, maybe... that one
will do...
\SE[2] (He said it was a 'hobby', but... this is...)

\SE[46]...Me, you know. I really like this song. It's like, an
irreplaceable time for two people in love... \SE[47]Don't you
feel that way too?
\SE[4]Eh, eh... It's a good song, isn't it...

\SE[57] (Can you play while talking...? \!\SE[58] This is
quite... \.impressive.)
\SE[2]...Do you like the piano, young lady?

\SE[2]No, not at all. \SE[4]My father often attends social
gatherings among nobles, and sometimes I play as a side
entertainment.

\SE[46]You see, when that happens... my father gets praised like,
Your daughter is amazing! \SE[4]That's pretty much the only
reason why I play. \SE[2]...So, I think I'll quit someday.

\SE[14]Eh, you're going to quit!? \!\SE[38]You're so talented, it
would be a waste...

\SE[33]I can't be satisfied with just this. \!\SE[49]It's not
about showing off or being a decoration... \!\SE[10]...I want to
truly stand by my father's side.

\SE[34]So... that's why I study hard and try to become smarter...
\SE[30]To be useful in my father's work, to make this house more
splendid, and to make my father the number one.

\SE[4]That is my dream \!\SE[0]so I will quit playing the piano
eventually.

\SE[53] (What am I doing? \!\SE[38] Carrying out orders... Doing
such a guilty job like this.)

\SE[3] (At the very least... my role is not to make this family
happy. \SE[53] ...I don't have the right to do that...)

\SE[3]...I actually told my father about it. But he opposed it.
\SE[5]Hmm... I wonder if he doesn't want me to help him...

\SE[47]I don't think that's the case. Music is the greatest
language, after all. \SE[48]...I'm sure your father also felt
regret about it.

\SE[4]The greatest language...? \.You also said it was the
ultimate form of expression earlier, right? \!\SE[0]...What does
that mean?

\SE[2]I can't perform or compose.... \!\SE[3]I'm just a listener
and an outsider who enjoys it, so I'm not sure if I can
accurately articulate it....

\SE[47]We... fight each other just because the place we were
born, the race we belong to, and the ideology we have are
slightly different. \!\SE[48]...It's inevitable because
elimination is the essence of humanity.

\SE\SE[0]Because the 'language' and 'environment' are different.
Even if it's a splendid book, if the language is different, you
can't read it. \SE[0]...But sometimes, 'music' surpasses those
obstacles.

\SE[46]There was a time when a certain music became popular.
\.Far, far away... across the sea, a long time ago, a piece was
created \!\SE[45]It moved many hearts, transcending language and
more.

\SE[6]... Can you imagine? Humans who usually hate and kill each
other, were pierced through the heart by just one song.

\SE[6]Hehe, don't you find it funny? \!\SE[5]Even though they are
so incompatible and have such a terrible relationship, deep down
in their hearts, they love the same thing. \!\SE[46]The core
strings are the same.

\SE[46]...Of course, that doesn't mean that conflicts will
disappear. \!\SE[45]But, I thought about it at that time. Surely,
music is the greatest language...\.that's what I believe.

\SE\SE[0]Surely, it is ingrained in our human genes. \SE[0]No
matter how far apart we may be...\.we can always return to the
same homeland. \SE[30]No matter how much we may fight, there will
always be understanding.

\SE[21]That's just a pipe dream.... Well, I understand it myself
too. \!\SE[20]But I just can't help but think about it.

\SE[46]This... is something that God has created. It is the only
language that we can understand each other.

\SE[51]...W-Wait, did I talk too much...!? I suddenly feel
embarrassed!! \!\SE[50]I hope you just took it with a grain of
salt...!!

\SE[2]Huh, are you stopping the performance? \!\SE[8]As for me, I
was hoping for a little more...

\SE[49]...I've never thought about it that way before. \.Well,
I've been trying to sort things out in my own way.

\SE[35]So, Father was disappointed. He didn't want me to abandon
my language...

\SE[54]I'm starting to get a little confused. \!\SE[50]If that's
what Father wishes... \...should I not quit playing the piano?

\SE\SE[0]No, let's quit the piano. \!\SE[0]What the young lady
wants is not dialogue, but to become a true support for her
husband.

\SE[2]There is no need for words there. \!\SE[0]You should live
strongly, as you wish.

\SE[14]...Oh! I forgot!! \!\SE[23]What should we do about the
interview!? If I can't pass, will we not have dinner
tomorrow...!?
And so, I ended up being taken care of by the Lira family.

Smart, noble, and full of pride... It was too dazzling for
someone as filthy as me.
